description.raw:
The tinyxml2 7.0.0 formula is broken right now, so I've made a temporary tinyxml2@6.2.0 formula in our tap, but it is keg-only (it won't sym-link to /usr/local), so we need to add some extra paths to environment variables when this is detected as a dependency.

Without this, the ign-common default branch fails to configure the graphics component (which needs tinyxml2):

* only 127 tests: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_common-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/118/testReport/

With this branch, it does build the graphics component:

* runs 157 tests: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_common-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/120/testReport/

title: Handle keg-only tinyxml2@6.2.0 in homebrew
